ygData.subject: Re: Staff Question
ygData.msgSnippet: OK well I think that answers that question...till i see someone with the staff.. thanks for all your replys! Auraelle ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
OK well I think that answers that question...till i see someone with the
staff..

thanks for all your replys!

Auraelle

----- Original Message -----
From: <zdogg@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:59 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Staff Question


> From: zdogg@...
>
> This is a totally flase rumor. Damn I wish I could remember the
article\'s
> location on this. A reporter went to lunch with Smedley and the head
programmer
>
> for the mage classes. he asked asked them this question and they
confirmed that
>
> it was not true, 100% false. The head caster programmer said that his GM
> Character had a Staff of Discord, which is the same staff that the Priest
of
> Discord is holding. Now they didn\'t say this was unattainable for us,
nor that
>
> killing the Priest of Discord would render it to us. So may be that their
is a
> quest to get this staff or something, but there is no way to combine the
two.
> They said you have to decide do you want the 2h staff and its magic or the
the
> skull with a dagger/fang or whatever. So Brad you are correct :)
>
> Zakrul The Traveler
> Companion
> Wizard
>
> > Message: 16
>
> > Any of you Wizards out there know what skull, you need to combine with a
> > Ruined Totem Staff...and what NPC combines them for you?
>
> > Auraelle
> > E\'ci Server
> >
> > Message: 19
>
> > Unless someone can come right out and give exact NPC names and info
> > right now, assume that combining the rts and the skull is just a rumor.
As
> > far as I know, the staff that Priests of Discord carry are actually
> > _different_ weapons and not a combo of these two items. No one to my
> > knowledge has actually been able to combine the two though many like to
> > claim that it is possible.
> >
> > Isand
>
> > Message: 23
> > Date: Thu, 13 May 1999 18:20:42 -0400
> > From: \"Brad Fetkovich\" <fetko1@...>
> > Subject: Re: Staff Question
> >
> > where did this rumor even get started? the skull goes in a melee slot,
who
> > thought up putting it on a staff? the priest of discords staff is
> > different, it\'s a staff of discord if i\'m not mistaken
>
>
